title: Rostra
mission: Rostra is dedicted to build a decentralized education and research system, so as to promoto the open access and innovation of knowledge.

edu.title: The problems of the current education system

admittance.title: Access Mechanism
admittance.description: Use score as the single dimension to measure whether a person can obtain good education resources

system.title: Education System
system.description:
The idea of education is outdated. People are treated as line products, everyone is learning at the same pace, diversified and individualized education cannot be provided 
 The knowledge system is updating slow, while not keeping up with the change of times

evaluation.title: Competency Assessment System
evaluation.description:
Centralization of power of the certification authority
 Certificate is only one-sided, can not show individual ability and character stereoscopically

autonomy.title: Governance Mechanism
autonomy.description: For those students who are most concerned about their future, on the contrary, they have no right to govern

reward.title: Reward Mechanism
reward.description: Students have to pay high tuition fees in advance for several years, while cannot apply what they learned to related area, even hard to find suitable job safter graduation

research.title: Problems of the existing scientific research system

ownership.title: Ownership
ownership.description: Some Peopleâ€™s scientific research/first byline does not belong to them, or even can not be publicly accessed

reward.title: Reward System
reward.description:
After the publication of scientific research papers, the interests are monopolized by the publishing group
After the scientific research achievement forms the product, the enterprise has obtained the maximum benefit, but the scientific research personnel has not obtained with the contribution matching reward

creative.title: Innovation promotion mechanism
creative.description: Many valuable research results are not open, which affects the speed of knowledge transformation into products and hinders the progress of society to some extent

rating.title: Value evaluation
rating.description:
Centralization of scientific research achievements rating system
Under the current grading system, papers can only be published in a limited number of journals

funding.title: Funding distribution
funding.description: The power to distribute research funding is centralized, even by a few people who do not understand the latest social developments

changes.title: What Can Rostra Bring to Change

edu.title: Education
edu.target5: Make learners acquire the lastest knowledge in time
edu.target6: Decentralize the authority of certificate issuance
edu.target7: Form a decentralized capability evaluation system

research.title: Research
research.target1: Establish reasonable ownership mechanisms,  so as to let individuals have the ownership of their own scientific research
research.target2: Change the reward mechanism of scientific research
research.target3: Form a decentralized system of value discovery and evaluation
research.target4: peed up the transformation process of scientific research achievements
research.target5: Promote the open access to scientific research

how.title: How to achieve?
how.description:
Open Source + Block Chain
Rostra will ultilize open source softwares and block chain technology to provide a new model of knowledge governance, thus to lead the innovation of education and research
